thread.section_title: Kiwi Drug Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Kiwi Drug | kiwidrug.com
thread.title: Judith

author: Judith
title: Judith
text:
I use several companies to buy medicinal products in the Net. In the last years I have found that Kiwidrug is the best one in several areas : speed of communication,good facilities to make payments, flexibility at, while following the law, interpreting in a logical way , the many
burocratic rules affecting the distribution of drugs in foreign countries , providing brand name drugs, not generic and, not to be forgotten, offering a very reasonable price for their products. Hope they go on giving the same type of service in the future. Judith
